page.title: 15Many events in Dulverton
page.content: For a small town like Dulverton suddenly this year there seems to be lots going on. Firstly a{Trim Trail}was built. With the help of the Royal Engineers, we have a track on the recreation field with 12 stations where you can keep fit, or just play. For instance there are some balancing bars, some ropes to climb and some ladders to hang from. Then the Water Authority is spending thousands of pounds on a{Flood {Prevention Scheme.}They have built walls and banks along the river, excavating the silting up under the bridge, and are putting in a huge overflow pipe to take away flood water from the stream that runs under the houses and streets of Dulverton. {Two Squash courts}are being built and twelve new houses are being constructed.
